label: ABC_cP12_198_a_a_a-001
title: Ullmanite (NiSSb, $F0_{1}$) Structure
comments:
(Ewald, 1928) originally designated CoAsS as {\em Strukturbericht} $F1$. This was later changed to $F0_{1}$. We follow (Parth\'{e}, 1993) in using NiSbS as the prototype for this structure. 
 The Sb (4a) Wyckoff parameter ($x_{3}$) has been corrected from 0.875 to 0.625, which matches the bonding distances given by (Y. Tak\'{e}uchi, 1957) (corrected on 2021/05/10).
